fields.subject: Invitation to the Brantham Garage Sale {{event_date}}
fields.html_content:
Brantham Garage Sale Craft Market - {{event_date}}

{{contact_name}},

We would like to invite {{trading_name}} to participate in the Craft Market in Brantham Suffolk on {{event_date}}. This year the event is supporting {{supporting_list}}.

The Craft Market will be held at Acacia Court, Brantham, and a pitch fee of £16.00 applies.

Click to Respond to this invite

Tony Flury
Craft Market Co-ordinator - Brantham GarageSale

fields.summary: Terms and Conditions for the Craft Market
fields.subject: Brantham Garage Sale - Craft Market Terms And Conditions
fields.html_content:
Craft Market Terms and Conditions - {{event_date}}

The Garage Sale and Associated Craft Market on {{event_date}} is raising funds for {{supporting}}.

Location

The Craft Market is being held at Acacia Court in Brantham: CO11 1TR. Specifically ﻿the Paved Area outside the East of England Co-op store.

The Craft Market is held close to the East of England Co-op store, and Chloe's Cafe, both of which are open all day of the Craft Market. There is an accessible Toilet within the Cafe which is available to stall holders.

Timing

The Garage Sale formally starts at 9am and closes at 3pm, and we request that Craft Market sellers are open within that time-frame if at all possible.

The Craft Market location is available from 8:00am on the day for setting up your tables and displays, and we ask that all Stalls are cleared away from 4:00pm on the day.

Pitch Sizes

A single pitch is sized as a 3m by 3m square, which should be sufficient for two standard sized tables (120cm by 80cm each) placed side by side and a gazebo/awning covering the tables.

If you need a larger area please contact the Craft Market Coordinator (see Contacts Section) and agree the details. Larger pitches may attract extra fees.

Pitch Fees & Payment

A Standard pitch (3m by 3m area) is charged at £16.00.
Payments must be made by 1st May or before. Payment via BACS is preferred : 

  • Account Type : Business
  • Name : Brantham Garage Sale Foundation
  • Acc # : 26992063
  • Sort Code : 30 99 50

Cancellation

Cancellations should be communicated as soon as possible to the Craft Market Coordinator - see Contacts Section.

It will not be possible to refund Pitch fees in the case of cancellations.

Contact and Further Inquiries

  • Craft Market Coordinator:  CraftMarket@BranthamGarageSale.org.uk.
  • General Inquiries: Trustees@BranthamGarageSale.org.uk
  • Foundation Website: Brantham Garage Sale
  • Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/BranthamGarageSale/
